document_data.name: War of 512
document_data.mainbody: The '''War of 512''' was an armed conflict between [[orc]]s of the [[Candlekairn clan]] of the [[Orsraun Mountains]] and the [[human]] nation of [[Turmish]] in the [[Vilhon Reach]].
document_data.Description: The War of 512 took place in the {{YearlinkName|512}} and started with swelling numbers of Orsraun Mountains orcs spilling onto the towns of Turmish. The horde ravaged and leveled the cities of [[Shaus]], [[Marikor]], and [[Dauntshield]], and by the end of summer of 512 DR, the Candlekairn clan horde was routed by armies of Turmish in the ruins of Dauntshield. In the aftermath, only one of the three razed cities was rebuilt â€“ Dauntshield.
